content.raw:
Hi,

I've installed gazebo6 by removing gazebo5, but it does not start.
I'm using Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

At first I installed it from the packages, then I tried from source, but nothing changed.
Just nothing happens when I try to launch gazebo from terminal, I waited for like 5 minutes and still nothing happened.

Possible problems I thought are:
- graphical drivers, it happened previously that there were problems, but it seems not to be the case this time, and all the other graphical applications still work without problems.
- The linux kernel got updated few days ago (current version 3.13.0-66-generic)
I also tried to install again gazebo5 but it seems to have the same problem. 

From top it seems that gzserver is running.

I compiled the source in debug mode and run valgrind and gdb with bt, and these are the output:

```
valgrind --leak-check=full --show-leak-kinds=all gazebo
==7411== Memcheck, a memory error detector
==7411== Copyright (C) 2002-2013, and GNU GPL'd, by Julian Seward et al.
==7411== Using Valgrind-3.10.1 and LibVEX; rerun with -h for copyright info
==7411== Command: gazebo
==7411== 
==7411== 
==7411== HEAP SUMMARY:
==7411==     in use at exit: 7,504 bytes in 2 blocks
==7411==   total heap usage: 1,601 allocs, 1,599 frees, 118,692 bytes allocated
==7411== 
==7411== 2,504 bytes in 1 blocks are still reachable in loss record 1 of 2
==7411==    at 0x4C2B0E0: operator new(unsigned long) (in /usr/lib/valgrind/vgpreload_memcheck-amd64-linux.so)
==7411==    by 0x62505F6: __static_initialization_and_destruction_0(int, int) (Rand.cc:45)
==7411==    by 0x625066D: _GLOBAL__sub_I_Rand.cc (Rand.cc:90)
==7411==    by 0x4010139: call_init.part.0 (dl-init.c:78)
==7411==    by 0x4010222: call_init (dl-init.c:36)
==7411==    by 0x4010222: _dl_init (dl-init.c:126)
==7411==    by 0x4001309: ??? (in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ld-2.19.so)
==7411== 
==7411== 5,000 bytes in 1 blocks are still reachable in loss record 2 of 2
==7411==    at 0x4C2B0E0: operator new(unsigned long) (in /usr/lib/valgrind/vgpreload_memcheck-amd64-linux.so)
==7411==    by 0x64897FB: __static_initialization_and_destruction_0(int, int) [clone .constprop.32] (Rand.cc:38)
==7411==    by 0x4010139: call_init.part.0 (dl-init.c:78)
==7411==    by 0x4010222: call_init (dl-init.c:36)
==7411==    by 0x4010222: _dl_init (dl-init.c:126)
==7411==    by 0x4001309: ??? (in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ld-2.19.so)
==7411== 
==7411== LEAK SUMMARY:
==7411==    definitely lost: 0 bytes in 0 blocks
==7411==    indirectly lost: 0 bytes in 0 blocks
==7411==      possibly lost: 0 bytes in 0 blocks
==7411==    still reachable: 7,504 bytes in 2 blocks
==7411==         suppressed: 0 bytes in 0 blocks
==7411== 
==7411== For counts of detected and suppressed errors, rerun with: -v
==7411== ERROR SUMMARY: 0 errors from 0 contexts (suppressed: 0 from 0)
```


```
gdb gazebo
GNU gdb (Ubuntu 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.2) 7.7.1
Copyright (C) 2014 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>
This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.  Type "show copying"
and "show warranty" for details.
This GDB was configured as "x86_64-linux-gnu".
Type "show configuration" for configuration details.
For bug reporting instructions, please see:
<http://www.gnu.org/software/gdb/bugs/>.
Find the GDB manual and other documentation resources online at:
<http://www.gnu.org/software/gdb/documentation/>.
For help, type "help".
Type "apropos word" to search for commands related to "word"...
Reading symbols from gazebo...done.
(gdb) run
Starting program: /usr/local/bin/gazebo 
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
[New Thread 0x7fffdfc75700 (LWP 7428)]
^C
Program received signal SIGINT, Interrupt.
0x00007ffff77fee45 in __libc_wait (stat_loc=0x7fffffffd250) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/wait.c:35
35	../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/wait.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff77fee45 in __libc_wait (stat_loc=0x7fffffffd250) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/wait.c:35
#1  0x0000000000403344 in main (_argc=1, _argv=0x7fffffffd408) at /home/yue/Other_SW/gazebo/gazebo/gazebo_main.cc:155
```

Thanks!
content.html:
Hi,

I've installed gazebo6 by removing gazebo5, but it does not start. I'm using Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

At first I installed it from the packages, then I tried from source, but nothing changed. Just nothing happens when I try to launch gazebo from terminal, I waited for like 5 minutes and still nothing happened.

Possible problems I thought are: - graphical drivers, it happened previously that there were problems, but it seems not to be the case this time, and all the other graphical applications still work without problems. - The linux kernel got updated few days ago (current version 3.13.0-66-generic) I also tried to install again gazebo5 but it seems to have the same problem.

From top it seems that gzserver is running.

I compiled the source in debug mode and run valgrind and gdb with bt, and these are the output:

valgrind --leak-check=full --show-leak-kinds=all gazebo
==7411== Memcheck, a memory error detector

==7411== Command: gazebo

==7411==

==7411==    by 0x62505F6: __static_initialization_and_destruction_0(int, int) (Rand.cc:45)

==7411==    by 0x4010222: _dl_init (dl-init.c:126)

==7411== 
==7411== 5,000 bytes in 1 blocks are still reachable in loss record 2 of 2
==7411==    at 0x4C2B0E0: operator new(unsigned long) (in /usr/lib/valgrind/vgpreload_memcheck-amd64-linux.so)
==7411==    by 0x64897FB: __static_initialization_and_destruction_0(int, int) [clone .constprop.32] (Rand.cc:38)
==7411==    by 0x4010139: call_init.part.0 (dl-init.c:78)

==7411==         suppressed: 0 bytes in 0 blocks
==7411== 
==7411== For counts of detected and suppressed errors, rerun with: -v
==7411== ERROR SUMMARY: 0 errors from 0 contexts (suppressed: 0 from 0)

gdb gazebo
GNU gdb (Ubuntu 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.2) 7.7.1
Copyright (C) 2014 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>

[New Thread 0x7fffdfc75700 (LWP 7428)]
^C
